attributes.action: Increase the amount of money put into WYPOF (Wiltshire Young People's Opportunity Fund).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Wiltshire Young People's Opportunity Fund does a LOT of good in Wiltshire. Loads of projects run and for young people in Wiltshire are able to happen, due to this type of funding from the Government. 
However there are still SO many worthy projects, which do not receive money due to limited funding!
If extra money was provided, young people in Wiltshire would be even more stimulated to channel their energy in positive and constructive ways, by giving something back to the community and helping demolish the media stereotypes of young people.
WYPOF money has already changed so many people's lives! Young people who are often hard to reach, through things such as disabilities or the rural areas in which they live! 
Music projects! Art projects! Sports projects!Improving youth centres! Points reward schemes! 
Government funding has been pumped into SO many things and done SO much good! Despite this, there are still plenty of young people who would hugely benefit from it!
Wouldn't it be nice, if this effective scheme could do EVEN more, to improve the image and perception of young people, help them feel better about themselves and help make their lives have more meaning?

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the local authority or funding body. Government does not fund directly.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
